line.token: * If you call read() in \phpseclib\Net\SSH2 you may get {@link http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ANSI_escape_code ANSI escape codes} back.
* They'd look like chr(0x1B) . '[00m' or whatever (0x1B = ESC). They tell a
* {@link http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terminal_emulator terminal emulator} how to format the characters, what
* color to display them in, etc. \phpseclib\File\ANSI is a {@link http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VT100 VT100} terminal emulator.
* Set the number of lines that should be logged past the terminal height
// single character CSI's not currently supported
// Move cursor to upper left corner
// set united states g0 character set
// Move cursor to screen location v,h
// Set top and bottom lines of a window
* Returns the current coordinate without preformating
* Returns the current screen without preformating
* Returns the current screen and the x previous lines
